scripts.generate-map: npx safetest generate-import-map src/app/Bootstrap.tsx src > src/app/imports.tsx
scripts.safetest:ci:test: rm -f artifacts.json && OPT_URL=https://safetest-two.vercel.app/next-app/ OPT_CI=1 OPT_DOCKER=1 OPT_ARTIFACTS=artifacts.json npm run safetest -- --run --bail=5
scripts.process:ci: npx safetest add-artifact-info artifacts.json results.json && cp results.json ../../build/next-app/results.json
